section.p: To inform users about relevant issues (e.g. their registration or assignment to a subscription), APPthe ROR integration softwarethe AWS integration softwarethe OpenStack integration softwarethe TPS5 integration software the vSphere integration software requires a mail server in its environment. You can use any mail server that supports SMTP.

The settings for addressing the mail server are defined in the glassfish.properties file for the bes-domain domain of of APP of the ROR integration package of the AWS integration package of the OpenStack integration package of the TPS5 integration package of the vSphere integration package.
